name: O Mestre Cervejeiro
description:
O Mestre Cervejeiro it's a 2D Arcade game inspired in Arcade games in the 90's.

Eddie it's the owner of a tavern in the kingdom, and has the perfect recepie for hydromel in the intire kingdom. The witch try's to enter the tavern, but the security stops and expel her from there, consumed by angry she steals the recepie from eddie and comeback to her castel. Eddie realizes the missing recepie and his mission it's take back the recepie from the witch.
